mapper.delete:
delete from new_dynamic where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select dy.`id`,dy.`news_id`,dy.`member_id`,dy.`transpond_type`,dy.`type`,dy.`creat_time`, dy.act_type,t.team_name,t.team_type,t.remark,t.team_title_img,type.type_name, (select count(new.id) from new_info new where new.team_id=t.id and new.`status`=1 ) as new_count, (select count(v.id) from volunteer v where v.team_id=t.id and v.audit_status=1 ) as v_renshu, (select count(act.id) from activity act where act.team_id=t.id and act.examine_status=2 ) as act_count from new_dynamic dy left join team t on dy.news_id =t.id LEFT JOIN team_type type on t.team_type=type.id WHERE dy.member_id=#{userId} and dy.act_type=3 and dy.type=2

SELECT dy.`id`,dy.`news_id`,dy.`member_id`,dy.`transpond_type`,dy.`type`,dy.`creat_time`, dy.act_type, act.`act_title`,act.`act_title_img`,act.`create_time`,act.`end_time`, (SELECT COUNT(apply.id) FROM act_apply apply WHERE act.`id`=apply.act_id ) AS baoming_count FROM new_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN activity act ON act.`id`=dy.`news_id` WHERE dy.member_id=#{userId} AND dy.act_type=2 AND dy.type=2 AND act.`examine_status`=2

SELECT dy.`id`,dy.`news_id`,dy.`member_id`,dy.`transpond_type`,dy.`type`,dy.`creat_time`, dy.act_type, info.`title`,info.`title_img`,info.`number_of_likes`,info.`public_time` FROM new_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN new_info info ON info.id=dy.news_id WHERE dy.member_id=#{userId} AND dy.act_type=1 AND dy.type=2 AND info.`is_del`=0

SELECT dy.`id`,dy.`news_id`,dy.`member_id`,dy.`transpond_type`,dy.`type`,dy.`creat_time`, dy.act_type, v.`head_img`,v.`volunteer_name`,v.`volunteer_number`,v.`remark` FROM new_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN volunteer v ON v.`id`=dy.`news_id` WHERE dy.member_id=#{userId} AND dy.act_type=4 AND dy.type=2 AND v.`audit_status`=1
